mapper.insert: insert into tb_qna (bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, pw) values (seq_tb_qna.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate, sysdate, #{pw})
mapper.select:
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, pw from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(tb_qna pk_tb_qna) */ rownum rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, pw from tb_qna where
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
